::Ramulus::

Ramulus nods, remembering his death.

"It was in a battle at the Ark. The Predacons attacked first, then the 
Alliance came in to finish off the wounded. Sometime in the battle, a 
Predacon self-destructed on me, putting me into stasis lock. Then new 
Predacon troops arrived at the battle, and one of them, Manterror, killed 
me," Ramulus growls, a wave of anger going through him, "I was just coming 
out of stasis lock."
